relationships.description: Snape was looking at Lockhart in a certain way, which made Harry think that if Snape had been looking at him like that he'd have run away.
Lockhart and Snape turned to face each other and bowed; Lockhart did it with much twirling of his hands, whereas Snape jerked his head irritably.
They raised their wands like swords in front of them.
Lockhart told the silent crowd that they would cast their first spells on the count of three.
Snape cried: 'Expelliarmus!' There was a dazzling flash of scarlet.
